title: U.S. Counterterrorism Operations Kill 2 Hostages Of Al-Qaida
teaser: President Obama announced that a U.S. drone strike killed two hostages held by al-Qaida: one American and one Italian. Separate operations also killed two U.S. citizens who were members of al-Qaida.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
